title: Will Mordekaiser Get A VU This Year?
body: Yes. I know there are others that need it just as bad or more. Don't need to tell me. Just wondering if he is or on the list or at least acknowledged by the Relaunch Team

replies.body: Will he get one eventually? Absolutely! This year? I doubt it. We have enough in our pipeline this year as far as I know.
How about gameplay wise, is there going to be any changes in near future?

Ok cool. Thanks for the response.

Do you know if Pantheon is in the pipeline for this year?
